{{lead.First Name:default=Valued HGuide Customer}},
Last week, we launched our new HGuide n380 inertial navigation system (INS/GNSS).
Engineered to complement our existing HGuide portfolio and meet customer demand, the HGuide n380 is a small, lightweight and highly reliable INS/GNSS that performs well in areas where continuous position and attitude navigation data is required.
Its competitive price, rugged design and high performance are ideal for customer applications ranging from UAVs to mobile mapping, autonomous vehicles and more.
In this announcement, you'll find a few helpful resources to introduce you to the HGuide n380. To read our official press release, please click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/press-release/2020/07/honeywell-expands-navigation-offerings]]>. The HGuide n380 blends data from our leading-edge i300 inertial measurement unit and a powerful dual-antenna, multi-frequency, multi-constellation RTK capable GNSS receiver.
Meet the n380 <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/sensors/hguide-n380-inertialgnss-navigator]]> Technical Documents
Honeywell's HGuide n380 brochure and manuals, located under the resources tab on our website, provides customers with a comprehensive view of its key characteristics, performance grades, software offerings, applicable accessories and more.
Download Brochure <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/content/dam/aero/en-us/documents/learn/products/navigation-and-radios/brochures/N61-2385-000-001_IMU_n380-bro.pdf?download=true]]> HGuide n380 Video
The HGuide n380 is a great solution designed for several different applications from mobile mapping and autonomous cars to UAVs and so much more. Watch the HGuide n380 video to see if it meets your company's needs.
Watch Video <[[https://youtu.be/OENGC66EAfk]]> Customer and Product Support
